p: The genetic transmission networks contained MSM from different areas, including 39 (35.8%) permanent residents of Kunming City, 47 (43.1%) temporary residents from other cities in Yunnan Province and 23 (21.1%) temporary residents from other provinces ( Fig 3C). For the three different sources of MSM, the constituent ratios of their potential transmission partners by areas showed no significant difference ( Fig 4). This result suggested that these three different sources of MSM were randomly mixed in the genetic transmission networks.
